sections.heading: findings.The Legislature finds that the benefits of quality child care and early childhood education are indisputable and that a striking connection exists between children’s learning experiences well before kindergarten and their later school success

sections.text:
77-3602.Legislative findings.

The Legislature finds that the benefits of quality child care and early childhood education are indisputable and that a striking connection exists between children’s learning experiences well before kindergarten and their later school success.

SourceLaws 2016, LB889, § 2.
